lab_equipment.Description: Not wearing safety goggles puts you in danger of eye irritation and possibly blindness in the case of an accident
lab_equipment.Availability: Safety goggles can be seen in bio chemistry lab.
lab_equipment.Condition: If you are working with chemicals, you must wear goggles.

lab_equipment.Description: A test tube is a glass tube with one end open and the other end closed.They are primarily used for qualitative assessment and comparison.
lab_equipment.Availability: Test tubes can be seen in bio chemistry lab
lab_equipment.Condition: Never heat a capped test tube.
